name: BIT-BOMB
description:
A 1 BIT BOMB MULTIPLAYER GAME.

WARNING

Warning game features flashing screens that may trigger epilepsy or other photosensitive conditions.

-------------------

PLAYER1 = GETS TO PLANT ALL THE BOMBS

PLAYER2 = MUST NAVIGATE THE MAP AND SCORE 10 POINTS WHILE AVOIDING THE BOMBS PLANTED BY PLAYER 1.

LIVES = PLAYER2 GETS 2 LIVES. IF PLAYER2 TOUCHES 2 BOMBS, THE TURN IS OVER,PLAYER 1 AND 2 MUST SWITCH ROLES AND THE SCORED POINTS MUST BE RECORDED .

WIN CONDITION:

THE PLAYER WITH THE MOST POINTS WINS OR IN CASE OF A TIE, THE ONE WHO ACHIEVED SAID POINTS IN LESS TURNS.

--------------------------------------
